Reine Geld-Mach-Maschine für Valve. Toxische Playerbase, die ohne Grund Leute kickt. Zudem noch die obligatorischen Cheater. Hat vorallem das Free-2-Play-Update noch viel anstrengender gemacht.

Минусы: Плюсы доступны лишь при вырубленном войс чате.

The game itself is pretty fun with friends but the Competitive scene is pretty much Russian. If you're russian go for it but if you ain't russian you gotta look for teammates in the community Social media (e.g Discord, TS). The core of the game is Competitive but there are also minigames which are mostly for warming up. There are alot of cheaters in every game if u don't buy the Prime mode. Either reach level 21 asap or just buy it at the beginning to atleast see less cheaters(not guaranteed cuz Valve doesn't care you know)
